  **As a** [role]  
  **I need** [function]  
  **So that** [benefit]  
       
 ### Details and Assumptions
xx.	 * [document what you know]
xxi.	   
xxii.	 ### Acceptance Criteria  
xxiii.	   
xxiv.	 ```gherkin
xxv.	 Given [some context]
xxvi.	 When [certain action is taken]
xxvii.	 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
xxviii.	 ```
